alert.note: Alert for Floyd; Johnson; Martin; Pike (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 2:47PM EDT until July 05 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Martin County in northeastern Kentucky... Southeastern Johnson County in northeastern Kentucky... Northern Floyd County in southeastern Kentucky... Pike County in southeastern Kentucky... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 246 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Whitepost to Ivel, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Forest Hills around 250 PM EDT. Pikeville around 255 PM EDT. Buskirk around 300 PM EDT. Chloe around 305 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these severe thunderstorms include Fishtrap Lake and Belcher. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
